item.title: Comptia A+ Core 1
item.description: This course provides everything you need in order to study for the CompTIA A+ Core 1 (220-1101) exam, including a downloadable Study Guide (PDF), quizzes to check your knowledge as you progress through the videos, and a full-length practice exam to test your knowledge before test day!
